• Multiplayer racing game using Three.js for 3D graphics and MQTT for real-time networking
  • Features terrain generation, particle effects, day/night cycle, and audio broadcasting system
  • Players can chat, play shared audio clips, and see each other's positions in real-time
  • Customizable cars with physics-based movement and local multiplayer support
    const mqtt = require('mqtt')
    const client = mqtt.connect('wss://broker.hivemq.com:8000/mqtt')

Infinity Racer is a browser-based multiplayer racing game that combines Three.js 3D graphics with MQTT networking. Players race across procedurally generated terrain, chat with others, and share audio clips through a spatial audio system. The game features realistic car physics, dynamic lighting, and supports multiple camera angles for an immersive racing experience.
